thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Rosemary Hussey

author: Rosemary Hussey
title: Rosemary Hussey
text: Only took minutes to find the flight and finish the transaction. Hours later a representative called our house to verify because the contact name and passenger's name are different, i think that was a good service. Hopefully they're telling me the truth that if there is a price drop before the intended flight that I can get it. Really great booking experience!
